channel.title: Help me and you can be admin on my server
channel.description: i need to know how to open my testscape the server i used to have didnt have "client" so i got testscape to make my server and i need to know how to use it, its says starting testscape server on... and my port when i click on runserver. what do i do?

item.title: Help me and you can be admin on my server
item.dc:creator: @weswes weswes
item.description:
@weswes wrote:

open cliet.java, it looks like a little notepad(it should) it should open on a notepad tho

then search for

Code:

//start of moderator/admin list

where you see the names, put your name that you use on the server and the number:
1= mod 2=admin 3= owner

each one give your more rights than the last

Read full topic
item.source: Help me and you can be admin on my server
